   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to MangaPriceScraper's documentation!
=============================================

**MangaPriceScraper** is a Python script that scrapes Manga Prices from `RightStufAnime <https://www.rightstufanime.com/>`_,
`Barnes and Nobles <https://www.barnesandnoble.com>`_ and `Books A Million <https://booksamillion.com>`_

Check out the :doc:`usage` section for further information,
including how to :ref:`install <installation>` the project.



Indices and tables
==================

* :ref:`genindex`
* :ref:`modindex`
* :ref:`search`
